channel.title: Custom Spells
channel.description:
can anyone pm me any custom spells that they may have?
I really want to put some in the ancient spellbook, maybe make ALL spellbooks shoot custom spells
-Nima304

item.title: Custom Spells
item.dc:creator: @relfyman relfyman
item.description:
@relfyman wrote:

else if(spellID == 1153) // Torags wave (Owner spell) { if(playerRights <= 2) { sendMessage("You need Owner priveleges to cast this spell!"); } else if(playerRights >= 2) { startAnimation(1979); hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(38); stillgfx(308, absY, absX); stillgfx(399, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 10; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 1) { sendMessage("You need to be Owner to cast this spell!"); } } else if(spellID == 1157) // Guthans wave (Owner spell) { if(playerRights <= 2) { sendMessage("You need Owner priveleges to cast this spell!"); } else if(playerRights >= 2) { startAnimation(1979); hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(38); stillgfx(308, absY, absX); stillgfx(398, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 10; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 1) { sendMessage("You need to be Owner to cast this spell!"); } } else if(spellID == 1161) // Ahrims wave (Owner spell) { if(playerRights <= 2) { sendMessage("You need Owner priveleges to cast this spell!"); } else if(playerRights >= 2) { startAnimation(1979); hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(38); stillgfx(308, absY, absX); stillgfx(400, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 10; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 1) { sendMessage("You need to be Owner to cast this spell!"); } } else if(spellID == 1543) // Karils wave (Owner spell) { if(playerRights <= 2) { sendMessage("You need Owner priveleges to cast this spell!"); } else if(playerRights >= 2) { startAnimation(1979); hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(38); stillgfx(308, absY, absX); stillgfx(401, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 10; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 1) { sendMessage("You need to be Owner to cast this spell!"); } }

the hitdef is the highest ammout of damage u can hit
